node.display_long_description:
Bigscreen is your VR movie theater.

WATCH 3D movies with friends in a virtual theater. 
PLAY your favorite PC video games on a huge screen. 
HANG OUT in social VR chat rooms.

We also host events like weekly 3D movie nights and live streams of SpaceX launches! 

--- Features ---

VIDEO PLAYER: play local video files stored on your VR headset. Supports 3D MOVIES in Side-by-Side 3D or Over-Under 3D.

REMOTE DESKTOP STREAMING: stream your PC's screen into your VR headset. Wirelessly play your favorite PC games. Play a movie or video on your PC and watch it wirelessly in your VR headset in a virtual movie theater.

TV Channels: watch movies, sports, comedy, and 50+ channels for free 24/7.

CROSS PLATFORM VR headset support!

Public and Private social VR CHAT ROOMS with up to 12 people.

Choose from a variety of environments like campfires and movie theaters.

latest_supported_binary.change_log:
Version 107 (01/28/2021):
- Added 14 ad-supported free-to-watch movies from PlutoTV in honor of Black History Month
- Fixed a crash from headsets running out of memory
- Various bug fixes and improvements

Version 106 (01/15/2021):
- Added ad-supported free-to-watch movies from PlutoTV
- Added a manual reload button for the Public Rooms UI
- Increased automatic reload of the Public Rooms UI to 30 seconds
- Added description field to Public Rooms UI popup
- Flipped the horizontal scroll direction for thumbsticks
- Removed the "Holiday Lobby" and added the normal Lobby
- Updated TV Rooms "No stream available" message to explain more information
- Various bug fixes and improvements

Version 106 (01/07/21):
- TV: added subtitles support and fixed a bug with age-gated TV channels
- Videoplayer: added support for inverted 3D modes (SBSRL and UO)
- Fixed bug with Videoplayer and Movie Rentals where playback controls were always appearing on-screen
- Improved lighting in the new Drive-In Theater
- Various bug fixes and improvements

Version 106 (12/23/20):
- NEW DRIVE-IN THEATER! Enjoy this nostalgic new environment from the comfort of your home!
- New UI gives an overview of Bigscreen’s features, and makes it easier to discover interesting videos to watch and rooms to join
- For paid movies, available subtitles are listed on the movie info page
- Lobbies now support up to 12 people per instance
- Fixed embedded subtitle support for the videoplayer on Quest
- Various bug fixes and improvements

Version 105 (12/19/20):
- Upgraded servers to prepare for the holiday influx.

Version 105 (12/3/20):
- Updated the lobby with some holiday cheer!

Version 105 (11/25/20):
- Fixed room description and categories not saving across app restarts

Version 105 (11/19/20):
- Various bug fixes

Version 105 (11/17/20):
- Green Screen Studio environment is now available on page 6 of the Environments section
- Added more seats in the 360 Skybox environments, including the new Green Screen Studio environment

Version 104 (11/12/20):
- NEW: Green screen environment added! Now you can record and stream your Bigscreen avatars to Twitch, Youtube, Zoom, and more! Share your creativity with us in our Discord or Twitter!
- Beefed up our servers to handle a large influx of users.

Follow us on Discord to see a list of all our latest and past updates! https://discord.gg/bigscreen

nodes.title: Bigscreen Launches Ad-supported, Free-to-Watch Movies!
nodes.body_text:
Hey everyone,

Over the past few years, we have added many “Screens” into Bigscreen for you to choose from: Desktop Screensharing, Videoplayer, live TV Channels, and 3D Movie Rentals.

In this update, we are launching a new feature: ad-supported, free-to-watch movies. Unlike Bigscreen’s paid movie rentals, which are partnerships with major movie studios like Paramount Pictures, these free movies are hosted on Pluto.TV and include ads from PlutoTV. These free movies can be watched on-demand at any time in any of our environments, such as the recently launched Drive-in Movie Theater.

Currently, the movies are available in the United States and include Arrival, Seabiscuit, Clueless, Nacho Libre, Adventureland, Blair Witch, Paranormal Activity 4, It Follows, and more. More movies will be added each month.

We’re working hard on licensing more 3D movies in the UK and other regions. This has been incredibly difficult because VR is such a small industry. Please bear with us while we try to sign more deals; in the meantime, the best way to help us grow the platform is to rent a movie from our website!

These free-to-watch movies are in 2D, unlike our paid movie service which has 3D movies for rent. 3D movies are incredible to watch in VR. If you haven’t experienced it, try watching our 3D movie trailers in VR and rent a 3D movie from our website if you like it!

Next, we’re actively working on built-in YouTube support and we plan to integrate more streaming services in the future. As previously announced, we are also developing a Friends System and a new technology to enable large groups of people to stream ultra-low latency video in VR.
 
Share your feedback with us on these new changes, features you’re looking for, and issues/bugs you experience! Let us know in our 17,000-person Bigscreen Community Discord or if email us directly at support@bigscreenvr.com.

nodes.title: Rick and Morty is now streaming for free in Bigscreen!
nodes.body_text:
Today, we're launching some amazing new free TV channels in Bigscreen such as Rick and Morty, Aqua Teen Hunger Force, Samurai Jack, Robot Chicken, The Venture Bros, The Eric Andre Show, and more!

Bigscreen TV lets you watch free Internet livestreams with your friends. Bigscreen doesn't host these channels. They are Internet livestreams on websites such as Twitch and YouTube. These sites are usually ad-supported and are sometimes region-restricted, so unfortunately not all channels are available worldwide.

In total, Bigscreen now has more than 172 free TV channels for people to watch. Our recent UI update released in December makes it easy to browse all of this content. In addition, Bigscreen also has dozens of 3D movies for rent, a free Videoplayer to watch your own video files, a free Remote Desktop feature to stream your Windows desktop screen into a room, and also public and private rooms to hang out and chat.

Today's new TV channels all have an age restriction on them, requiring users to consent that they are 18 or older before entering. Bigscreen's built-in Parental Controls also allow parents to prevent their children from entering any of these 18+ rooms, public rooms, or social situations.

We have a lot in store for 2021! We're developing a Friends System, new servers that dramatically improve the video/audio streaming quality, a new Remote Desktop feature with ultra-low latency desktop streaming to the Quest, built-in YouTube support, enabling TV Channels in private rooms, and more!

node.reviewDescription:
Is it just me or everyone's mics are way too loud in this app? I have to turn down the volume of the headset way down for bearable voice volume but then I can't hear the movie content. Or mute lobbies and watch things normally without any chatting. There is no setting for just voice volume, only watch content.

RecRoom and even vTime XR have voice levels that are on point, what happened here? Besides this caveat, this is a great app to check out 3D movies. But please fix the volume levels.

Update: There's an option to turn down a user's volume when you select them in watch room menu. Updating review to 4 stars because it's still annoying to have to do that everytime. I wish there was an option to select a user with your pointer to lower their volume.
